## IJsonConverterOptions.onUndefinedPropertyValue property

If [onUndefinedPropertyValue](./ts-json.ijsonconverteroptions.onundefinedpropertyvalue.md) is `'error'`<!-- -->, then any property with value `undefined` will cause an error and stop conversion. If [onUndefinedPropertyValue](./ts-json.ijsonconverteroptions.onundefinedpropertyvalue.md) is `'ignore'` (default) then any property with value `undefined` is silently ignored.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onUndefinedPropertyValue: 'error' | 'ignore';
```
